reviews.text: I was craving great pizza, and since Lancaster County lacks quality options, I decided to try your place, despite the 50-minute drive. My caregiver was kind enough to make the trip, and your 15% discount was a pleasant surprise. The pizza had cooled slightly by the time it reached us, but it was still delicious. Your staff was friendly and welcoming, making the experience even better. We‚Äôll definitely be back. Thank you!

Delicious Coal-Fired Pizzas ‚Äì Just Missing a Halal Option

Tried the Grandma and Pesto pizzas ‚Äî both were delicious! The crust was perfectly crispy with that rich, smoky coal-fired flavor, and the cheese and toppings were fresh and satisfying. The revolving oven was a really cool touch that added to the whole experience.

Dropped a star only because, as someone who mostly reviews halal spots, there weren‚Äôt any halal meat options available. I went the vegetarian route instead, which was still tasty ‚Äî but having a halal choice would‚Äôve made it even better. Still, a solid spot for quality pizza with a unique twist!

I came here for a team lunch when traveling for work. My husband and I shared slices of:

- Honey Mustard
- Cheesesteak
- Chicken Bacon Ranch
- New York
- Spicy Taco

The honey mustard was hands down my favorite. The sauce was delicious. I wasn't a fan of the chicken bacon ranch. It had a different style crust (cut square) that I didn't like as much. The rest of the slices were also good.

If you're looking for a quick lunch in the area, this is a good choice.

Great Pizza. Will keep comming back.
But the dinning area looks like it hasn‚Äôt been cleaned in days.

My favorite lunch spot when I work from the office - nice easy walk on a good day from the Chesterbrook campus. All the flavors are great! I wish they did have a meatball option for the coal fired pizzas. A reward system would be a cool perk too.

recentReviews.text: Excellent excellent excellent pizza. By the slice or order in.

Their pizzas are always pretty solid but this time I tried their salad and garlic knots and did not disappoint! Plentiful and very well balanced, flavorful without being too heavy or unhealthy. A nice portion that lasted two meals for me :D
Had two pizzas last night, and they were drastically different. One crust was perfect with great sauce, the other was cooked for too long, and there was next to no sauce. Doesn‚Äôt make any sense.

Delicious Coal-Fired Pizzas ‚Äì Just Missing a Halal Option

Tried the Grandma and Pesto pizzas ‚Äî both were delicious! The crust was perfectly crispy with that rich, smoky coal-fired flavor, and the cheese and toppings were fresh and satisfying. The revolving oven was a really cool touch that added to the whole experience.

Dropped a star only because, as someone who mostly reviews halal spots, there weren‚Äôt any halal meat options available. I went the vegetarian route instead, which was still tasty ‚Äî but having a halal choice would‚Äôve made it even better. Still, a solid spot for quality pizza with a unique twist!

detailedReviews.author: Benjamin Kemp
detailedReviews.text: Excellent excellent excellent pizza. By the slice or order in.

detailedReviews.author: Sara Torres
detailedReviews.text: Their pizzas are always pretty solid but this time I tried their salad and garlic knots and did not disappoint! Plentiful and very well balanced, flavorful without being too heavy or unhealthy. A nice portion that lasted two meals for me :D

detailedReviews.author: Dave Eckert
detailedReviews.text: Had two pizzas last night, and they were drastically different. One crust was perfect with great sauce, the other was cooked for too long, and there was next to no sauce. Doesn‚Äôt make any sense.

detailedReviews.author: Shan Sayed
detailedReviews.text:
Delicious Coal-Fired Pizzas ‚Äì Just Missing a Halal Option

Tried the Grandma and Pesto pizzas ‚Äî both were delicious! The crust was perfectly crispy with that rich, smoky coal-fired flavor, and the cheese and toppings were fresh and satisfying. The revolving oven was a really cool touch that added to the whole experience.

Dropped a star only because, as someone who mostly reviews halal spots, there weren‚Äôt any halal meat options available. I went the vegetarian route instead, which was still tasty ‚Äî but having a halal choice would‚Äôve made it even better. Still, a solid spot for quality pizza with a unique twist!

detailedReviews.author: Sean Young
detailedReviews.text: Excellent food and service. Glad I discovered this place

detailedReviews.author: Douglas Bechtel
detailedReviews.text: I was craving great pizza, and since Lancaster County lacks quality options, I decided to try your place, despite the 50-minute drive. My caregiver was kind enough to make the trip, and your 15% discount was a pleasant surprise. The pizza had cooled slightly by the time it reached us, but it was still delicious. Your staff was friendly and welcoming, making the experience even better. We‚Äôll definitely be back. Thank you!

detailedReviews.author: Andrew Moralph
detailedReviews.text: Always excellent pizza and great customer service.

detailedReviews.author: S T
detailedReviews.text: The pizza we got was genuinely bad. We took a few bites and gave it back to them without complaining and were going to leave, when the guy who made it asked what was wrong with it. We told him we thought it tasted gross and he proceeded to say no one has ever complained and was just super stand offish about it. He begrudgingly offered to make us another but we declined and left because it was uncomfortable. Wasted money.

detailedReviews.author: Nicholas DiLisi
detailedReviews.text: Food is always great and done on time.

detailedReviews.author: Noel Harding
detailedReviews.text: The sauce was very sweet and sooo yummy!

detailedReviews.author: Carol-Anne Rapier
detailedReviews.text: This is actually an Italian restaurant, not just a pizza place. The prices are very reasonable and the food is delicious.

detailedReviews.author: Sue Valeri
detailedReviews.text: Excellent food and friendly service. Every time we order.

detailedReviews.author: Joe Niszczak
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was okay

detailedReviews.author: Eugene Prout
detailedReviews.text: I completely loved my cheese pizza w/fresh garlic.

detailedReviews.author: Luke Wallace
detailedReviews.text:
Unless you‚Äôre buying slices or actually sitting down to eat do not order from here.

Called in an order for a simple salad a half an hour before my lunch break, was told it would be 20 minutes. Showed up 30 minutes later and was told they didn‚Äôt have my order in the system at all. Poor management or poor phone training either way bad service.

detailedReviews.author: Scott Shirel
detailedReviews.text: Staying in nearby hotel and placed online order. Paid via credit card. Upon arrival they have no record of an order. I have a receipt and order number emailed to me. Offered to let me pay twice. I declined. They weren't able to refund so forced to dispute with credit card company. Guys there were nice but really ridiculous and disappointing.

detailedReviews.author: Susan Teaford
detailedReviews.text: Our party got the cheesesteaks and the Chesterbrook salad. Everything was fresh and delicious. They were busy, as it was noon, but service was quick and efficient.

detailedReviews.author: Laney Flitt
detailedReviews.text: Owner was very friendly and service was great. Very nice seating area inside. Would come here again.

detailedReviews.author: Simona Hollland
detailedReviews.text:
We ordered catering for our travel basketball food and everything was amazing and delicious üòã
Thank you for the great food and service.
We will definetly return when coming for our next tournament.

detailedReviews.author: Eddie Caballero
detailedReviews.text:
Awesome food , friendly, kind n professional crew n they are bilingual. ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚ûïÔ∏è

detailedReviews.author: Henry Zawada
detailedReviews.text:
First time customer tonight and ordered take out.  The regular special pizza was very satisfying!

Tony
I ordered the special pizza again this afternoon and my wife and I enjoyed it with the black olives ! Henry

detailedReviews.author: Ron Calhoun
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is ok but overpriced ( messed up my order 3x!) and service has gone down since hiring all local high school kids. Cheese steaks used to be great but haven't had one since discovering Steaks in West Chester.

detailedReviews.author: Russell March
detailedReviews.text: The Worst delivery drivers.in a effort to be fair the food is fine. It's the delivery people that are wild. They are rude will curse at you then literally run away. My last order and the reason for my review is because never comes to my door but calls me on my phone to meet him at his car. When I get there he complains that he didn't want to come up because my house was a 15 min drive. I then go to pay and ask for change so I could give him a tip. I didn't want to just hand a $50 bill for a $31 dollar order. He proceeded to lie says he don't carry change and i should of piad by card. So then I'm like fine heres $32 since you have no change. Says wait let me look for some change. I said I know your liying no delivery driver in thier right mind doesn't carry change. Plus you've just been extremely rude, told on yourself that you just didn't want to walk up so you made me come meet you. Have a nice day here's $32. He then snatches the money calls me a few curse words. I set down the order and asked if he really felt that way and he turn ran in to his car made and excuse about how he can't cause he's a work. And I respond with he should talk about it if he's not really about it, and he drove off. Forgetting to take his stuff of the top of his car which fell as he tried to drive away. I called the store a basically got told everybody was to busy to take a call and they would call me back. It's bullshit so instead of waiting I figured I just leave a review.

detailedReviews.author: Sheryl Dobbins
detailedReviews.text: The pizza is so good and the staff are very friendly!

detailedReviews.author: Kasey Dobson
detailedReviews.text: My boyfriend ordered two pizzas one with pineapple and another plain coal fired for his mother who's vegetarian. The person taking the order on the phone asked if the coal fired had sausage and he reiterated it was just plain. When he went to pick up the pizza did have sausage on it and the person at the counter was a little accusatory about the order sausage until he explained it was for a vegetarian before making a new pie. We usually have a good experience here and the food is good so hopefully this is a one off situation.

detailedReviews.author: Flip057
detailedReviews.text:
Great Pizza. Will keep comming back.
But the dinning area looks like it hasn‚Äôt been cleaned in days.

detailedReviews.author: Lindsay Gersbach
detailedReviews.text: Delicious pizza, friendly atmosphere!

detailedReviews.author: Mary Jo Keszczyk
detailedReviews.text: Food is always on point. Quick service

detailedReviews.author: Steve King
detailedReviews.text: I have ordered the hot dinners on several occasions. The large portions of chicken and veal Parm were tasty as well the eggplant Parmesan. They included a salad, spaghetti and either bread or garlic knots. Finally the price was very reasonable.

detailedReviews.author: John Moore
detailedReviews.text: Really excellent local pizza

detailedReviews.author: Joseph Fusco
detailedReviews.text: Great menu, and more than just pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Joe Suprenuk
detailedReviews.text: Great as usual!

detailedReviews.author: Jeff S.
detailedReviews.text: HG has been on point every time we order for years now. You can‚Äôt match the Coal Fired Pizza and the rest of the menu is solid day in and day out!

detailedReviews.author: Jay Jay
detailedReviews.text: My daughter made me drive there. It‚Äôs 40 minutes away. Their wings are great pizza New York style chicken cutlet homemade can‚Äôt say no more.

detailedReviews.author: Brandi Hogan
detailedReviews.text: Best food and really great people!

detailedReviews.author: michelle logreco
detailedReviews.text:
Ordered cheese sticks, veal parm and a side of meatballs.
Who serves Italian food without parmigiana cheese? A salad without salt and pepper and dry garlic knots ( not fresh)?
The veal was good, spaghetti al dente,
So disappointed they did not bring the enhancements for the meal( unfortunately, I did not ask!)
I‚Äôd recommend and definitely try again.

detailedReviews.author: Paul Ealy
detailedReviews.text: Good coal-fired pizza. Better than Anthony's.

detailedReviews.author: S.
detailedReviews.text: I love the regular pizza, well done, thin crust. Best pizza around. It's my favorite pizza spot.

detailedReviews.author: Ross Jacobs
detailedReviews.text: Super friendly staff, great food, quick service. I have recently been stopping in for lunch and taking out for dinner, both experiences have been great.

detailedReviews.author: John DiPietro
detailedReviews.text: Great food, family friendly

detailedReviews.author: Wayne Van Curen
detailedReviews.text: Above average pizza, especially enjoyed the coal fired option

detailedReviews.author: Kimberlee Nacarelli
detailedReviews.text: This is the only place we ever order pizza from, it‚Äôs the best in the area. Recently, my husband found a buy one get one 50% off entree‚Äôs coupon, so we figured we would give it a try. I was skeptical because it‚Äôs a small pizzeria inside. I ordered the lasagna and my husband ordered the veal parm. They were both delicious! They both also came with a salad which was nice. I asked for a cup of water because I needed to take a pill, but someone was working on the soda machine and the water was turned off. The man behind the counter insisted that I take a bottle of water for the inconvenience. What great customer service!

detailedReviews.author: Garrett Bolger
detailedReviews.text: Pasta dishes and pizzas are excellent.

detailedReviews.author: Brad Pejsa
detailedReviews.text: Excellent pizza.  I ordered the New Yorker.  Crust was light and crisp.  Toppings tasted great.  A very good slice of pizza.  I will be back.

detailedReviews.author: Christina JG
detailedReviews.text: Get the Mango habenero sauce wings. You won't be sorry. Coal fired pizza is the best.

detailedReviews.author: marielle huff
detailedReviews.text: Always great!!

detailedReviews.author: Colin Minnick
detailedReviews.text: Excellent pizza, moderately priced.

detailedReviews.author: TB Eisenhower
detailedReviews.text:
We love HG and had been eating here since it opened. We used to order at least once a month, and often times would walk right up as we live in the neighborhood. Over the last year or two, the menu prices have almost doubled. We were effectively priced out, as paying almost $100 for 2 medium pizzas, a kid's hamburger, an order of wings, a salad, and 4 drinks is highly unreasonable. Food and staff = 5 stars. Prices = 1 star.

Edit for September 24:
This place is hard to deny. The people working here are very accommodating and the food is always high quality and cooked well. They are well worth the price of their food and we feel fortunate to be able to walk to HG to eat.

detailedReviews.author: Chris Kirman
detailedReviews.text: Good pie and nice atmosphere for a pizza shop.  Plenty of seating and some TVs

detailedReviews.author: Steven Tong
detailedReviews.text: We ordered 2 coal fire pizzas. 1 Margherita and 1 pepperoni. They were both delicious!!!

detailedReviews.author: Joanne Decker
detailedReviews.text: Loved their takeout Margherita pizza

detailedReviews.author: Matt Illich
detailedReviews.text: Tasty pizza in a pleasant atmosphere.  Large food selection.

detailedReviews.author: Justin Lyons
detailedReviews.text: good food

detailedReviews.author: Mixhael Bonner
detailedReviews.text: Great Pizza Shop with a very friendly staff. Got 2 pieces of pepperoni for like $6 bucks and cannot complain about it one bit. Thanks again to the kid at the front who was very nice!

detailedReviews.author: Slane
detailedReviews.text: AVOID. The manager was very rude and would constantly yell at his employees. Around a week ago my friend and I ordered a pizza to share and it took them around 35 minutes despite there only being two other people in the restaurant. Also when we got our food it did not taste good. The atmosphere was very tense and you can tell the workers are stressed.

detailedReviews.author: Wayne Thornton
detailedReviews.text: Meats loves deep dish

detailedReviews.author: Polina Osipova
detailedReviews.text: My favorite lunch spot when I work from the office - nice easy walk on a good day from the Chesterbrook campus. All the flavors are great! I wish they did have a meatball option for the coal fired pizzas. A reward system would be a cool perk too.

detailedReviews.author: Ryan Carella
detailedReviews.text: Took an hour to come but this place is 2 mins away took way to long

detailedReviews.author: Toni Marie Lesh
detailedReviews.text: AMAZING pizza and salad!  Must try!

detailedReviews.author: Joseph C Deiter
detailedReviews.text: Vegetable pizza was excellent. Pepperoni was not.

detailedReviews.author: Maurice Wright
detailedReviews.text: My slices were left in the oven a bit too long. Great pizza ..I just think they may have been busy with other orders causing them to overlook the slices and deal with the whole pies in the oven .

detailedReviews.author: Empressive Living
detailedReviews.text: Great üçï! The only thing I messed up on was to 86 the garlic on my pizza üòñ

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers have positive experiences overall. Your 4.5/5 rating from 100 recent reviews shows solid satisfaction with room for growth.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the perfectly crispy crust with a rich, smoky coal-fired flavor, which adds a unique twist to the pizza experience. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The staff is consistently friendly and welcoming, enhancing the overall dining experience. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The restaurant offers plentiful and well-balanced salads and garlic knots that are flavorful without being too heavy or unhealthy. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Inconsistent order accuracy and customer service issues (e.g., wrong toppings, accusatory staff, missing orders) - review management can address this concern
Long wait times and order mishandling (e.g., orders not found in the system, long delivery times) - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Negative reviews and poor reputation due to rude staff and delivery issues - review management can address this concern

positive.text: Excellent excellent excellent pizza. By the slice or order in.

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
